node.detail_zh: 患者就讀香港專業教育學院 （IVE） 將軍澳李惠利分校，9 月 29 日最後一日上學，同日出現咳等病徵，翌日到急症室求診。他於 9 月 23 日曾去尖沙咀利就商業大厦的酒吧 China Secret。其家人（第 #5112 宗個案患者）其後確診。
node.detail_en: The patient studies at Hong Kong Institute of Vocational Education (Lee Wai Lee), Tseung Kwan O, and last attended class on September 29, having developed coughs and other symptoms on the same day. He visited an accident & emergency department next day. On September 23 he went to a bar named China Secret at Lee Chau Commercial Building, Tsim Sha Tsui. His family member (patient #5112) was later on diagnosed as well.

groups.description_zh: 群組最早朋受感染的一名泰國遊客及一名學生，兩人於 9 月 23 日到訪 China Secret，其後多名曾到訪 China Secret 及居於豪麗大廈的泰籍女子確診。

node.location_zh: 香港專業教育學院（李惠利）
node.location_en: Hong Kong Institute of Vocational Education (Lee Wai Lee)
